trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Panama City
There were no other sightings in Panama City on or around July 31st 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were at our wharehouse, which is right next to the panama cityairport. I am a student pilot, and we were talking about that. I looked at theobject, and believed it to be a star. We talked for a few more minutes, and Ithought I saw the star move. I stared at it for a minute, then my friendwatched. The star then moved closer to us until it was almost over head. Itbegan to glow very bright, with a blue tint. It then shot straight up anddisapeared. I called my girlfriend and told her what had happened. I did notgive my friends info because amazingly, he doesnt remember the incident at all
